projects.title: Medical Chatbot
projects.bodyText:
- Built an end-to-end AI medical question-answering system over long-form clinical content.
- Implemented a **RAG** pipeline with **Pinecone** for context-aware retrieval.
- Automated deployment using **Docker**, **GitHub Actions**, and **AWS**.

projects.title: Twitter Hate Speech Detection
projects.bodyText:
- Built an RNN-based hate speech classifier with **93.8%** validation accuracy and **91%** recall on **56,745** tweets.
- Designed a custom NLP tokenizer with 50K vocabulary and sequence padding for model training.
- Trained a 5.1M-parameter LSTM with PyTorch Lightning and deployed with CI/CD on AWS.

projects.title: Identifying Question Pairs with Similar Intent
projects.bodyText:
- Built a semantic duplicate-question detection model using Random Forest and Gaussian Naive Bayes.
- Achieved **75%** accuracy and **60%** recall with TF-IDF features and text preprocessing pipeline.
- Deployed the model with **Streamlit** for interactive real-time inference.

projects.title: juniorSHAKESPEARE: Build a Character-Level Language Model
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented a character-level language model inspired by classic GPT architectures to generate Shakespeare-like text.
- Explored and coded two versions (`gpt1.py` and `gpt2.py`) of generative models and trained them with a curated dataset.
- Documented the model development and experimentation process using **Jupyter Notebook** (`build_gpt_from_scratch.ipynb`).
- Used the tiny Shakespeare dataset for training and text generation tasks.

projects.title: Semantic Property Matching System
projects.bodyText:
- Built a hybrid recommendation engine to match users with real estate properties by combining **semantic text similarity** and **numerical structured features**.
- Converted user preferences and property data into text and computed embeddings using **pretrained transformer models**.
- Calculated hybrid match scores based on **cosine similarity** and numeric feature alignment.
- Included a **Streamlit app** for interactive property recommendations.
- Provided visualization utilities for analyzing recommendation scores and outputs.
